hooks.command: bash -c 'if git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel); [ -x "$ROOT/.claude/hooks/git-header.sh" ] && exec "$ROOT/.claude/hooks/git-header.sh"; fi; exit 0'
hooks.description: Generate git status header on conversation end

statusLine.command: bash -c 'if git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then ROOT=$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel); [ -x "$ROOT/.claude/hooks/git-header.sh" ] && "$ROOT/.claude/hooks/git-header.sh" --status-only; else echo "Not in git repo"; fi'
